name: Pool of Radiance
description:
Pool of Radiance is a RPG game developed by Strategic Simulations and Stormfront Studios. It was originally released in 1988. Fujisankei Communications International published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Pool of Radiance on Classic Macintosh, NES, PC and Apple II. The game is sold via GOG.
Christopher Erhardt and Nicholas Beliaeff produced the game. It was directed by Chuck Kroegel, Graeme Bayless, Nicholas Beliaeff and Nicolas Eypert. It was scored by David Warhol, Hironari Tadokoro, Seiji Toda and Seiji Toda (MSX).
